00046 class GameStaticMovementState : public GameState {
00047         public:
00048                 //** Used for memory management, presets pointers to NULL.
00049                 GameStaticMovementState();
00050                 
00051                 //** Enforces memory safety by forcing the Cleanup function.
00052                 ~GameStaticMovementState();
00053 
00054                 //** Initializes the state using an external script.
00055                 void Init( const char* theScript = NULL );
00056 
00057                 //** Cleans up any leftover state assets, such as entities
00058                 void Cleanup();
00059 
00060                 //** Handles events that have been triggered by the player.
00061                 bool HandleEvents( PlatformEngine* game,
00062                                 SDL_Event& event );
00063 
00064                 //** Runs any new state logic necessary before continuing.
00065                 void Update( PlatformEngine* game );
00066 
00067                 //** Draws the state's entities to the display screen.
00068                 void Draw( SDL_Surface* mainScreen );
00069 
00070         private:
00071                 //** The background settings for this state.
00072                 GameMap* theMap;
00073 
00074                 //** The entity representing the player on this state.
00075                 GamePlayer* thePlayer;
00076 };
